schemas.name: Attack with DBIED
schemas.description: An event scenario that results in an DBIED attack

steps.name: Get drone
steps.comment: provenance is "n/a" because the event was not found in the documents.

steps.name: Build a DBIED
steps.comment: Because this step was found in the documents (Graph G), we specify the step ID from Graph G as provenance.

values.name: drones
values.comment: Any argument that was found in Graph G specifies the participant id from Graph G as provenance.

values.name: the stage where Maduro is speaking
the drone that exploded near the stage where Maduro was speaking

steps.name: Juan Manuel Santos and Julio Borges collaborated on drone attack
steps.comment: Steps from Graph G that are not matched to the schema will have ta1ref of "kairos:NULL".

values.comment: This second argument filler could also be represented by an additional Participant.
values.name: Julio Borges
Drone explodes near the stage where Maduro is speaking
Drone explodes at nearby apartment building

steps.name: Drones are disoriented with radio signal inhibitors
Drone is diverted toward nearby apartment building

values.name: the drone that crashed into the apartment building
the drone that crashed into the apartment building

steps.name: Drone explodes at nearby apartment building

values.name: the drone that crashed into the apartment building

order.comment: Order relations introduced by TA2 should also have a ta1ref of "kairos:NULL".

relations.name: Nicolas Maduro is president of Venezuela
relations.comment: This relation was not in the original schema, but was added so TA2 can use a TA1 relation.

relations.name: The apartment building damaged by the drone is near the stage where Maduro was speaking
relations.comment: This relation was in Graph G, but not matched to a TA1 relation.
